```{r}
library(Revelio0.1)
datasetToAnalyse <- 'sf002'
dataList <- readRDS(paste('~/Studium Doktorarbeit/Projects/CellCycleSorting/Scripts/Revelio_0.1/OutputDataFiles/', datasetToAnalyse, '/', datasetToAnalyse, '_FullData.rds', sep = ''))
dataSource <- dataList@DGEs$countData
cyclicGenesSource <- read.xlsx(dataList@datasetInfo$ccPhaseAssignGeneBucketListFileLocation, 1)


myData <- createRevelioObject(rawData = dataSource,
                              cyclicGenes = cyclicGenesSource)
myData <- getFilteredDataBynUMIAndnGeneThresholds(dataList = myData)
myData <- getCellCyclePhaseAssignInformation(dataList = myData)
myData <- getFilteredDataByCCPhaseAssignOutliers(dataList = myData)
myData <- getNormalizedData(dataList = myData)
myData <- getVariableGenes(dataList = myData)
myData <- getPCAGenes(dataList = myData)
myData <- getPCAData(dataList = myData)
myData <- getOptimalRotations(dataList = myData)
myData <- getRotation2D(dataList = myData)
myData <- getCCSorting(dataList = myData)

```
